snippet: With the next election for governor more than 18 months away, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and the state Democrats are stepping up their effort.
abstract: New York State Gov Andrew M Cuomo is stepping up efforts to support priorities of state's Democratic Party, with the next election for governor more than 18 months away; party is broadcasting a series of television commercials on issues like gun control and the state budget and has spent about $1.5 million on ads in 2013 to get ahead of criticism, even with Cuomo's poll number are still enviable.
lead_paragraph: With the next election for governor more than 18 months away, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and the state Democrats are stepping up their effort.

headline.seo: Cuomo’s Re-election Machinery Is Already at Work
headline.main: Cuomo’s Re-election Machinery Is Already at Work
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s Re-election Machinery Is Already at Work
